dialogBox.title: Pastikan hal-hal berikut sebelum Anda melanjutkan
listItems: Anda berada di lingkungan yang aman dan terjamin
Anda memiliki waktu setidaknya 10-15 menit untuk menyiapkan dompet Anda
Anda memiliki koneksi internet yang aktif
Segel tahan rusak pada paket tidak rusak
Cypherock tidak akan pernah meminta Anda untuk frasa seed Anda maupun meminta Anda untuk menandatangani transaksi
Cypherock hanya akan mengirim email dari cypherock.com. Jangan percaya email dari domain situs web lainnya

userNew.title: Saya menggunakan Cypherock X1 untuk pertama kali
userNew.note: Pilih ini jika Anda belum pernah menggunakan Cypherock X1 sebelumnya

userExpert.title: Saya sudah menggunakan Cypherock X1
userExpert.note: Pilih ini jika Anda ingin memigrasikan dompet Anda ke Cypherock X1 yang baru. Hal ini mungkin diperlukan jika Anda kehilangan X1 Vault dan satu atau lebih dari X1 Cards

terms.title: Syarat Penggunaan

terms.consent: Saya telah membaca dan setuju dengan Syarat Penggunaan dan Kebijakan Privasi

success.title: X1 Vault Anda berhasil diautentikasi

cardTraining.subtext: Kartu Anda berkomunikasi dengan perangkat melalui NFC terenkripsi. Pastikan Anda tetap mengetuknya sampai Anda mendengar bunyi bip

cardAuth.title: Ketuk X1 Cards satu per satu di bawah X1 Vault hingga Anda mendengar 3 bunyi bip
cardAuth.subtext: Angkat kartu Anda setelah 3 bunyi bip

pages.title: Selamat, dompet Anda berhasil dibuat
Lain kali bila Anda perlu melakukan transaksi, Anda hanya perlu mengambil satu X1 Card beserta X1 Vault
Jika Anda kehilangan X1 Vault, Anda dapat membeli X1 Vault baru secara terpisah dan menggunakannya dengan X1 Cards lama Anda
Catatan Penting

messageBoxList.warning: Jika Anda perlu menambahkan dompet lain, Anda harus mengambil keempat kartu sekaligus. Jika Anda ingin mengimpor dompet lain Anda ke Cypherock X1, sekarang adalah saat yang terbaik untuk menghindari repot di masa mendatang

pages.title: Sebagai langkah selanjutnya, simpan X1 Cards Anda dengan aman di dalam lengan kartu dan distribusikan mereka di berbagai tempat. Beberapa contoh tempat bisa jadi:
bulletList: Rumah anggota keluarga atau teman Anda

betaNotification.description: Kami telah melakukan perombakan besar pada cySync app. CySync baru hadir dengan semua fitur favorit Anda dan masih banyak lagi. Unduh dari https://cypherock.com/get-started **Penting** * Anda tidak akan kehilangan dana Anda * Setelah update, Anda harus mengimpor akun Anda lagi * Tidak ada pembaharuan baru untuk CySync v1 kecuali pembaharuan keamanan

reminderInfo.subtitle: What is reminder time?
reminderInfo.subtext: Reminder Time is the interval at which you'll receive a confirmation email from Cypherock to verify your continued well-being. If no response is received within two months of the initial email, the inheritance process will commence and your nominee will receive the recovery instruction email from Cypherock

You can also include the passphrase in this message

editAccount.title: Edit Akun

toggleWalletOnPortfolio.title: Tampilkan/Sembunyikan Wallets di Portofolio
toggleWalletOnPortfolio.description: Anda dapat menonaktifkan wallet tertentu dari sini. wallet tersebut tidak akan ditampilkan di halaman portofolio

currency.title: Mata uang pilihan
currency.description: Pilih mata uang yang ditampilkan di samping saldo dan operasi Anda

region.title: Wilayah
region.description: Pilih wilayah Anda untuk memperbarui format tanggal dan waktu

password.title: Kata Sandi
password.description: Ubah atau matikan/aktifkan kata sandi untuk CySync App Anda

anayticsAndBugReport.title: Analitik & Laporan Bug
anayticsAndBugReport.description: Aktifkan analitik & laporan bug untuk membantu Cypherock meningkatkan pengalaman pengguna & membantu menyelesaikan masalah Anda lebih cepat. Ini termasuk klik, kunjungan halaman, pengalihan, tindakan (kirim, terima, kunci, dll.), guliran akhir halaman, (un)instalasi dan versi aplikasi, jumlah akun, aset kripto dan operasi, durasi sesi, tipe perangkat Cypherock dan firmware

reset.title: Atur Ulang CySync
reset.description: Hapus semua data CySync yang disimpan di PC Anda, termasuk akun, riwayat transaksi, dan pengaturan Anda. Harap diperhatikan bahwa ini tidak akan menyebabkan kehilangan aset

update.title: Pembaharuan CySync
update.description: Unduh pembaruan CySync secara otomatis jika tersedia

usb.title: Diagnostik USB
usb.description: Pemecahan masalah koneksi USB dengan perangkat

transferWallet.title: Transfer Wallet
transferWallet.description: Jika Anda pernah memiliki Cypherock X1 dan ingin mentransfer wallets menggunakan kartu Anda jika kehilangan atau alasan lainnya

termsOfUse.title: Ketentuan Penggunaan
termsOfUse.description: Dengan menggunakan CySync Anda setuju dengan Ketentuan Penggunaan kami

privacyPolicy.title: Kebijakan Privasi
privacyPolicy.description: Lihat Kebijakan Privasi kami untuk mempelajari data pribadi apa yang kami kumpulkan, mengapa dan bagaimana kami menggunakannya

silver.title: Silver
silver.description: Secure your wallet PIN with us and easily recover it if forgotten, ensuring continuous access to your crypto assets.

gold.title: Gold
gold.description: Ensure your crypto assets are inherited by loved ones effortlessly, bypassing complex legal restrictions for smooth transfers.

owner.title: Owner

nominee.title: Nominee
nominee.subtitle: Somebody made you a nominee of their assets

setupCover.title: Setup Cypherock Cover
setupCover.subTitle: Protect your crypto assets and ensure smooth transfer to your beneficiaries in unforeseen circumstances.

syncFromMail.title: Sync from Email

learnMore.title: What is Cypherock Cover?

ensure.title: Ensure the following before you continue
instructions: Make sure you have 15-30 minutes to set it up
You are present in a safe environment
You need to have one device and one card handy to set it up

video.title: Watch the whole video before you proceed
video.subTitle: The video will help you take the right decisions

selectWallet.title: Select the wallet you want to cover in this plan
selectWallet.subTitle: For setting up additional wallets, individual plans can be created later
selectWallet.tooltip: This wallet is not having a PIN setup, create a new wallet or select a different wallet having PIN setup

walletAuth.heading: Wallet Authentication
walletAuth.title: Follow instructions on the X1 Vault to authenticate the selected wallet
walletAuth.subTitle: Authenticating the wallet

actions.tapCard: Enter PIN and tap any one card

messageBox.warning: Lift your card after 3 beep sounds

error.title: Wallet Authentication failed
error.subtext: We could not authenticate the selected wallet

messageBox.warning: This usually happens when the wallets in the Cysync and the device are not in sync. Sync the wallets between the Cysync and the device or choose a different wallet

emailField.label: Primary Email
emailField.tooltip: Enter the email on which you want to receive all reminder emails

select.title: How many nominees do you want?
select.subtitle: You can have up to 2 nominees for this will
select.tooltip:
In case if you select two nominees then the 2nd nominee will receive the recovery email three months after the 1st nominee receives it
Note - Both nominees will receive the same recovery email and same message written by you on the CySync app

options.descOne: Select if you want to have only one nominee
options.descTwo: Select if you want to have two nominees

first.title: Add first nominee
first.warning: Make sure you give a card to your nominee
first.tooltip: Your Nominee will receive recovery instructions on this email

second.title: Add second nominee
second.warning: Make sure you give a card to your second nominee

confirm.title: Do you want to verify nominee emails?
confirm.subtext: An OTP will be sent to the provided emails. If you do not want to inform the nominee about this plan, you can skip verification of emails.
confirm.warning: Make sure you provide correct emails.

select.title: Do you want to have an executor for this will?
select.subtext: The executor will help the nominee to recover funds
select.tooltip:
An executor/helper can be someone you trust who does not have any financial stake but can be assigned as a helper to the nominee for funds recovery
The executor will receive the email on the same time as the nominee.

one.desc: A tech savvy person whom you trust

two.desc: If your nominees are tech savvy

executorDetails.title: Add executor
executorDetails.tooltip: Executor will receive instructions  to help nominee on this email

radio.label: Choose a nominee to link with executor
radio.tooltip:
Select the nominee you want to link with the executor. If you choose Nominee 1 then the executor will receive their email written by you on same time as Nominee 1.

If you choose Nominee 2 then the executor will receive their email written by you on same time as Nominee 2 i.e, 3 months after Nominee 1.

tutorial.title: Watch the whole video before you proceed further
tutorial.subtext: How to write the final messages

nominee.title: Draft the final message for the nominee
nominee.subtitle: The nominee messages will be end-to-end encrypted
nominee.tooltip: End-to-end encryption keeps your messages between you and the nominee you choose. Not even Cypherock can read them

locationField.label: Card Location* & Passphrase
locationField.tooltip:
Write down the location of another card for the nominee to fetch. Nominee will only be able to recover crypto assets after getting another card. Remember this card should be different than the card(s) you may have given to your nominee(s).
You can also include the passphrase in this message.

personalMessage.label: Personal Message*
personalMessage.tooltip: This can include your will/message for the nominee and other important pieces of information that you may want your nominee to know such as your crypto exchange account details, coins you have amongst others.

messageBox.warning: Make sure you describe the card's location clearly for the nominee

executor.title: Add a message for the executor
executor.subtitle: Please note that the message to the executor is not encrypted
executor.tooltip: This message will be received by the executor in case recovery is triggered, it's recommended to NOT add any critical information here

summary.heading: Summary
summary.title: Summary
summary.subtitle: Please verify all the details before it gets encrypted with the device

confirm.title: Follow instructions on the X1 Vault to verify the nominee message
confirm.subtext: You can encrypt the message in the next step

actions.verifyLocation: Verify Card Location in your device

messageBox.danger: Read through the whole text and verify that the message shown in the device is same as you entered in cySync

device.title: Follow instructions on the X1 Vault to encrypt the wallet PIN
device.subtext: Lift your card after 2 beep sounds
device.tooltip: Tap any one X1 card below the X1 device to encrypt the message and do not remove the card until you hear 2 beep sounds

actions.tapCard: Enter PIN and tap any one card

messageBox.warning: The PIN will be encrypted by the X1 card

loading.title: Please wait while we send the encrypted data to the server
loading.subTitle: Do not disconnect or close the app

success.title: Nominee message successfully encrypted
success.subtext: To complete your gold plan setup, you can now proceed with the plan purchase

payment.title: Complete your payment
payment.subtext: You have to purchase the plan on the Cypherock website and then apply the generated coupon code in the 'Coupon Code' section below to complete your purchase

greeting.title: Thank you!
greeting.subtext: Your Gold Plan is now activated
